title: In-Depth Learning of Human Metabolic Processes Based on Virtual Reality

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Biochemistry and Understanding of Cellular Respiration Processes
context.additional_context: Individual VR device utilization and asynchronous learning support via LMS

learning_goals: Accurately explain the electron transport chain and oxidative phosphorylation processes via virtual reality simulation with 80% or higher accuracy.
Analyze ATP generation mechanisms in metabolic pathways through 3D spatial exploration and summarize findings in a 15-minute presentation.
Collaboratively solve problems involving biochemical interactions in a VR learning environment (achieving a formative evaluation score of 4/5 points).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
